channel.title: Really Stable Server Version 2
channel.description:
Meh, just wanted to test out a few things and it seems they worked well, become some people are just too lazy to do the stuff I have done, I will release under GNU (Feel Free to Edit)
This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see .
I guess you would like pictures of a blank server? No. Download: Link provided by [b]jmood128[/b] http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ohoyqh3mxon My fingers hurt so I cba to post, I will update this later, or tomorrow. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]Version two[/b] I released my other version that I was working on, I came to realize I shouldn't be working on such a unstable server and decided to go back to Rs2D, unfortunately this one has not got thread per client added, I may update in future but today I'm just going to post it. The one feature I added is the web server, this is pretty effective and useful in most cases. The code is terrible though, I don't have time to improve it. [b]This server has no anti leech, although it is not better than the earlier version, stable wise.[/b] [b]What's new?[/b] Added a few skills, these skills include; FireMaking Fletching Mining Woodcutting Started on Cooking but have not added to the server. Added NPC, these can be spawned and used for combat training. Player saving is improved dramatically. Shops added and can be used. Packaged the server a little, not to much for new programmers. ----------------------------------------- [b]Download link[/b] http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=478b93d2422a50116e7203eb87368129e04e75f6e8ebb871 [b]Virus free?[/b] Yes, uploaded to media fire so don't bother asking for a virus scanner (Even though virus scans can't detect malicious objects in Java files). [b]Pictures[/b] Going to add soon. [b]Agreement[/b] Once again;
This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see .
^ Feel free to edit. [b]Credits [/b] [i]Version 1[/i] Winterlove. Graham. Si force. M.dog - For teaching me some basic stuff. [b]Me. [/b] [i]Version 2[/i] Winterlove. M.dog - For teaching me some basic stuff. Delta_ - I used his server to learn the basics, yes I know. [b]Me. [/b]

item.title: Really Stable Server Version 2
item.dc:creator: @Vira Vira_
item.description:
@Vira wrote:

bluurr:

Is that what people call shit code, anti leach now?

Yes it is. This server wasn’t designed for anything in particular, it was a little fun development I done to see if some of the features actually work, and I guess they do.

Read full topic

i didn’ i posted a better anti leech lol this one really makes it hard to leech

[client-321]haxor: accept connection 2398sdf.somehost.net clientHandler:accepted [client-321]haxor: absx = 2543 asby = 3487 Connection lost, attempting to load..... [client-321]haxor: Disconnected [Really Stable Server]: CRASH

hehehehehe, looks good though :D[/quote]
thats called a pwn lol

EDIT: thats his anti leech fix btw i added my anti leech to the wrong one sorry but use my anti leech its pwnage

EDIT2: i also added another anti-leech to the anti-leech if they could figure the first one out lol
